title: Flex’s Q3 Results Link NVIDIA And LG Deals To AI Growth Potential
title_zh: Flex 第三季度业绩将 NVIDIA 和 LG 交易与人工智能增长潜力联系起来
summary: Flex (NasdaqGS:FLEX) reported robust Q3 results, highlighting progress with key partners NVIDIA and LG. The company announced significant investments in advanced technologies that support AI and data center infrastructure.
summary_zh: Flex（纳斯达克GS：FLEX）公布了强劲的第三季度业绩，突显了与主要合作伙伴 NVIDIA 和 LG 的合作进展。该公司宣布对支持人工智能和数据中心基础设施的先进技术进行重大投资。

title: Software Stocks Sell-Off: Are They Deals or Traps?
title_zh: 软件股抛售：是交易还是陷阱？
summary: Possible negative AI impacts are spooking technology investors but is the selling overdone?
summary_zh: 人工智能可能带来的负面影响令科技投资者感到不安，但抛售是否过度了？

title: Is Salesforce’s (CRM) Army AI Deal Quietly Redefining Its Government Strategy?
title_zh: Salesforce (CRM) 的陆军人工智能交易是否正在悄然重新定义其政府战略？
summary: In late January 2026, Salesforce announced a US$5.60 billion, 10-year IDIQ contract with the U.S. Army, alongside new AI-driven partnerships and government-focused initiatives.
summary_zh: 2026 年 1 月下旬，Salesforce 宣布与美国陆军签订价值 56 亿美元、为期 10 年的 IDIQ 合同，以及新的人工智能驱动的合作伙伴关系和以政府为重点的举措。

title: KKR to Add Sports Franchise Exposure Through Arctos Acquisition
title_zh: KKR 将通过收购 Arctos 增加体育特许经营业务
summary: KKR & Co. is set to acquire Arctos Partners in a $1.4B stock-and-cash deal, boosting its sports investing platform and launching a new Solutions business.
summary_zh: KKR & Co. 计划以 1.4 亿美元的股票和现金交易收购 Arctos Partners，从而增强其体育投资平台并推出新的解决方案业务。

title: Update: Market Chatter: Goldman Sachs, Blackstone, Apollo Global Back Funding for BGH Pharma Deal
title_zh: 更新：市场热议：高盛、黑石、Apollo Global 为 BGH Pharma 交易提供支持资金
summary: (Updates with Blackstone and Apollo Global Management's response in fourth paragraph.) Goldman Sa
summary_zh: （更新了 Blackstone 和 Apollo Global Management 在第四段中的回应。） Goldman Sa
